text: The Oeste Ladies Open is a tournament for professional female tennis players played on outdoor hard courts. The event is classified as a $60,000 ITF Women's Circuit tournament and has been held in Caldas da Rainha, Portugal, since 2019. == Past finals == === Singles === {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Isabella Shinikova || Natalija Kostić || 6–3, 2–0, ret. |} === Doubles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Jessika Ponchet Isabella Shinikova || Anna Danilina Vivian Heisen || 6–1, 6–3 |} == External links == * ITF search Category:ITF Women's Circuit Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019 Category:Hard court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Portugal Category:2019 establishments in Portugal
title: Oeste Ladies Open
